snippet: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services acknowledged that its five-star rating system needed work, given that it relies heavily on self-reporting.
abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services announces substantial changes to its five-star rating program for nursing homes; acknowledges that system needed work, given that it relies heavily on self-reporting.
lead_paragraph: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services acknowledged that its five-star rating system needed work, given that it relies heavily on self-reporting.

headline.main: Medicare Revises Nursing Home Rating System
headline.print_headline: U.S. Revises Nursing Home Rating System
